actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to provide that in applying the formula for computing a local government's revenue sharing funds the amount of such government's taxes which are allocable to the expenses of education shall not be excluded in determining such government's tax effort factor.

summary.text: Revises the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act to provide that in applying the formula for computing a local government's revenue sharing funds the amount of such government's taxes which are allocable to the expenses of education shall not be excluded in determining such government's tax effort factor.

titles.title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to provide that in applying the formula for computing a local government's revenue sharing funds the amount of such government's taxes which are allocable to the expenses of education shall not be excluded in determining such government's tax effort factor.
